Oak_Lawn.Merrionette Park Fire Department:
The Merrionette Park Fire Department provides fire protection and emergency medical services to the village of Merrionette Park, Illinois. The department was established on May 23, 1949 after an ordinance was adopted in the village's municipal code to create a fire department.


== Station and apparatus ==
The current fire station is located at 3165 W. 115th Street and houses a fire engine, a 106 feet (32 m) ladder truck, a Ford Expedition response vehicle and a basic life support (BLS) ambulance.
